items.title: Nationwide: House price growth slows but market remained resilient despite Budget worries
items.description: The average price of a house in the UK was £272,998 in November, as annual house price growth slowed to just 1.8%, Nationwide said.

items.title: What to do with old £1 coins
items.description: The old one pound coin was demonetised in 2017, but there are still millions out there in the UK. Here’s what to do if you find an old £1.

items.title: December Premium Bonds winners announced – did you win £1 million?
